description: This file is an HTML document for a web-based database viewer interface. It includes structure, styles, and client-side JavaScript code to display databases, tables, and table data with interactive features.

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Fetches list of databases from API and renders them in the sidebar.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Refreshes the database list when refresh button is clicked.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Expands or collapses the list of tables for a selected database.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Fetches list of tables for the selected database.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Fetches and displays data for a selected table.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Generates HTML for a data table from fetched data.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Renders individual cell content, handling objects and long text with expand functionality.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Expands or collapses cell content showing full or truncated data.
